name: Laalima
greetingText: Aapka naam hi itna pyara hai ki i like to say it again n again! :P
wishText: Wish u always keep smiling like the way you do ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you Laalima!! Many many happy returns of the day...
text2: Wait...u might be thinking ye to maine already kardia
text3: Fir what's all this and Surprise kahan hai?? xD
text4: I realised, I always wanted to do something
text5Entry: And you wanna know why?? Coz...,
outroText: And haan, i know ek baar dekhne se mann nahi bharega tumhara...
replayText: So, click here to watch it again.
